name: 財務管理專題研究
description:
本課程為統整性之財務課程，涵蓋財務學門各領域之重要專題，除財務理論最新課題之介紹外，著重理論與實務的結合。本課程主要教學目標在於訓練學生統整性之財務理論基礎，並連結金融業界實務的應用，提高學生之研究能力與實務專業。
This course is an integrated graduate-level course, which covers updated empirical research in all areas of finance and real-world applications of finance theories in the finance industry. Classes include introduction of updated finance theories, discussion on empirical research articles, and guest speeches on related practical issues. The relative emphasis is put to topics in investment.
goals: Learning important theories and concepts in various areas of finance
Applying finance theories to industry practice
Enhancing quantitative techniques and modeling used in finance research
Developing decision-making skills using financial theories and methodology
syllabus:
1.      Introduction

2.      Risk and Return

3.      Real Options

4.      Application of Real Options

5.      Guest Speaker

6.      Asset Allocation

7.      Quantitative Trading

8.      Guest Speaker

9.      Empirical Research 1: Initial Public Offerings

10.    Empirical Research 2: Market Efficiency

11.    Empirical Research 3: Asset Pricing Models

12.    Empirical Research 4: Market Microstructure

13.    Empirical Research 5: Corporate Finance and Governance

14.    Empirical Research 6: Portfolio Performance Evaluation

15.    Empirical Research 7: Institutional Investment

16.    Empirical Research 8: High Frequency Trading

17.    Self-directed Learning: Selected Financial Topics

18.    Self-directed Learning: Selected Financial Topics
